core.description: The core of jQuery UI, required for all interactions and widgets.

datepicker.description: A datepicker than can be toggled from a input or displayed inline.

effect.description: Extends the internal jQuery effects, includes morphing, easing and is required by all other effects.

position.description: A utility plugin for positioning elements relative to other elements.

widget.description: Provides a factory for creating stateful widgets with a common API.
